data.message: MY FACEBOOK WAS HACKED AND YOU HAVE NO CUSTOMER SERVICE TO HELP!!! He changed all the security even the "trusted contacts" to his own so I have no way to get back on!!!! You need to do something about this or delete the account altogether! He is pretending to be me and has access to all my info and pictures!!!!

replies.message: Hey Lauren. If  your account was taken over by someone else, we can help you secure it: https://www.Facebook.com/hacked -Chantal
Please READ WHAT I WROTE!!! I've tried that but the only option I have is trusted contacts and the hacker changed them!!!!

My question is I have this G'Five G10 Fashion smartphone with 4.2 android (Jellybean), It came as preinstalled Facebook which has an older version of facebook which I don't like much when i go to playstore and try to download Facebook it downloads smoothly but when the installation process comes up it gives an error ''duplicate provider authority'' I can't even uninstall the default Facebook and neither can update it, Please help me out thanks
facebook please the adminstration disabled my old account , so i want to recover him ? why you not respond
Like they really need do somethig mines hacked also
I get it, thanks for all that you Do do to help us resove priblems FB. What would we do without you?? Have a Blessed day!!
